title: Anyone finding it hard to climb already?
body:
My current games consist of queuing for a lane to having my jungler power farm instead of counter ganking, to queuing for jungle having my supports not buy sightstone to queuing for support having my jungler power farm instead of counter ganking. It's a vicious cycle of omg im in elo hell already xd? 
The best is when i attempt to tell them to possibly counter gank or buy a sighstone. The answers are pure rage enticing and really really upsetting haha.

Anyway! Any tips to start my season 8 grindy climb? :)

Edit: Hope everyone is doing well!

replies.body: do you even play the game? I feel youre just here to troll
I hate that guy man. he just tries to get people to react badly to him.
You're playing the game too much, so you have soo much problems with it.
you don't play enough so your point is invalid
Don't worry, he was the argument for the mods to basically get rid of one side of an argument.
I swear you're in a video on youtube, someone was spectating your game
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MD8UFYslHDw you probably know about it but here, you're in this video
By "counter gank" do you mean just "gank"?
he means when the other teams jgler ganks, his jgler follows up on it. lol
He only plays aram so he has no idea what any of this is
I got outta bronze last season. Then went back into it lol.

I'm only a gold1 last season scrub but ill tell you what I'm doing now. I'm going to que for jg and camp the hell out of top until they baby rage and what not. going to play one of the hyper carries and go for gold.
